title: Adolescence
creator_credit: M K Productions, Philippe d'Argila and Daniel Riche
brief_description: A young girl takes ballet lessons with the Princess Troubetzkoy, a very old yet still famous ballerina. One day, she auditions for a ballet company, but another girl gets the job. So the girl goes back to the Princess to continue her studies. A sensitive study of an adolescent ballerina. With Sonia Petrovna and Madame Egorowa.
